document_data.name: Coralynn Winsail
document_data.mainbody: '''Coralynn Winsail''' was an inhabitant of [[Yûlash]] in the late 15{{th}}.{{Cite adventurers league/Death on the Wall|12}}
document_data.Activities: Coralynn cared for her four [[mastiff]]s at the [[Red Plumes]] camp in Yûlash.
document_data.History:
''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Coralynn disliked all the trouble caused by the visit of [[Torin Nomerthal]] to the city.{{Cite adventurers league/Death on the Wall|15}}

Coralynn was chosen to be in the Hillsfar contingent during the allied assault to [[Maerimydra]]. She was sent as messenger to advise about the apparition of the [[Mother]].{{Cite adventurers league/Assault on Maerimydra|29}}
document_data.Personality: Coralynn was interested only in her mastiffs. She attacked anyone who tried to harm them.
